questions.question: What's your subscription model?
questions.subtext: (Pricing tiers, billing frequency, features per tier)
examples: Single tier at $19/mo with annual discount
follow_ups: What features are in each tier?

questions.question: What user roles/permissions do you need?
examples: Admin (full access), User (create/edit own data), Viewer (read-only)
Organization Owner, Team Admin, Team Member
follow_ups: What permissions does each role have?

questions.question: Do you need multi-tenancy (organizations/workspaces)?
examples: Yes - each company has separate workspace
Team-based - users can belong to multiple teams
follow_ups: Can users belong to multiple organizations?
How is data isolated between tenants?

questions.question: What's the user onboarding flow?
examples: Email signup → verify email → setup profile → tour → first project
Invite-only → admin creates account → user sets password
follow_ups: What's the first action users should take?

questions.question: What third-party integrations do you need?
examples: Stripe for payments, SendGrid for email
follow_ups: Which integrations are must-have for MVP?
Do users connect their own accounts or use yours?
